headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid ZBH and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, Zimmer Biomet’s shares have sunk to $98.28, producing a disappointing 5.8% loss - a stark contrast to the S&P 500’s 6.7% gain. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
